segments.text: I can’t believe how calm the woman is while everything is going wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and she’s just drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle, but she doesn’t even seem to feel it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that stool, and it’s making me anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s reaching for the cookies, and the stool is wobbling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is going to be so mad when she sees the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting slippery, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the children will get away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a chaotic scene, but everyone is acting like it’s normal.
segments.speaker: PAR
